name: .TRANSMITSERVERS File Extension
summary: Learn about .TRANSMITSERVERS files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a TRANSMITSERVERS file in Panic Transit (Mac), to import the server list the file contains. To do so:
Open Transit and select Servers → Import from → Transmit.
Navigate to and select your TRANSMITSERVERS file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
